body.name: Dokotoo Womens Casual Short Sleeve Waffle Knit V Neck Button Down Shirts Side Slits Loose Tunic Tops Blouses
features: Features: Short Sleeve Tops for Women, Waffle Knit Shirts for Women, Button Down Henley Shirts, Casual Tunic Tops, V Neck T Shirts Women, Blouses for women fashion 2024, Womens Tops and Blouses, Cute Tops for Women Trendy, Drop Shoulder, Side Slits, Solid Color, Loose Fit Pullover Top.

Design: Waffle knit top is a fashionable and comfortable addition to any wardrobe. The unique texture of the fabric gives the top a trendy and modern look, while the soft and cozy material ensures maximum comfort. This waffle knit short sleeve blouse is sure to become a go-to favorite.

Material: Dokotoo womens short sleeve shirts is made with high-quality waffle knit fabric, breathable, lightweight, soft, durable, friendly to skin, which will bring you a comfortable dressing experience.
Match: The waffle knit tunic tops makes the perfect chic & casual style. You can pair summer tops with jeans, denim shorts, skirts, leggings, sneakers or heels to complete casual look.

Occasion: This 2024 fashion loose blouse is perfect choice for daily life, party, school, vacation, holiday, office, work, home, date, outdoor activities, shopping and any other occasions. Perfect gift for mom,wife,daughter,girlfriend,or to your own.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dokotoo Womens Summer Tops Waffle Knit Casual Oversized T Shirts for Women
Please Refer To Our Size Chart Carefully

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can feel the texture, it feels nice. It is a loose nice shirt. See my pictures.
reviews.reviewText: This is a very comfortable shirt.This shirt has some cute side slits. See my picture.This shirt bottom band is a nice touch.This shirt has a small ribbon covering the seams from neckline to end of sleeve. Love this!This shirt has the sleeve go down to my elbow. See my picture.This shirt front has five buttons. You can have all five buttoned or all five not buttoned or any way you want.This shirt was made with a waffle texture. You can feel it. See my picture.This shirt has nice seams and hems, all nice and straight, with no hanging threads.This shirt is 75% polyester and 25% cotton.The tag sewn into seam states machine wash warm (85F) anddo not bleach, do not tumble dry, steam iron low and dryclean any solvent modified cycle.This shirt says loose tunic shirt. They are correct about the looseness. See my picture with the buttons showing. See down the side how wide it is. I am just able to get into 2X most of the time, and this is pretty loose. Take that into consideration when selecting size when you purchase this shirt.The shirt has stretch side to side only.I recommend this shirt. It is comfortable and feels good to the touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oversized and well made
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the size XL for my wife, the shirt arrived shrink-wrapped which usually means a ton of wrinkles, but because of the tight waffle-weave (not the standard, but mini), the wrinkles just fell away. My wife likes the boxiness of this shirt. The seams are all finished nicely, the hem has about 4" slits on the side which are a nice touch. The sleeves are slightly bat-wing and the v-neck has 5 functioning buttons. The band on the hem is about 2 inches deep and is flattering. This is a great casual shirt to pair with shorts or jeans. The price seems right on this one. It's 75% polyester, 25% cotton and has a more cottony hand-feel. No special laundering requirements, no bleach. The fabric is a great springtime blend, might be too warm for the dog days of summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to loIke this shirt. The fabric is beautiful and soft and I love the color. I am a size 10/12 and ordered the medium which is my usual size. Unless it is mismarked sadly it is too large to wear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the most flattering style.
reviews.reviewText: I like the style of this waffle knit short sleeve top, in general. I typically wear a size 12, so after looking at the chart, I chose the Large size. Unfortunately, I should have picked a size smaller, because it just looks too big on me. I would recommend choosing a size down, because it seems to run big. The top is made of good quality material and is well-made. Other than the size, it’s a nice top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable, Good Fit
reviews.reviewText: I like this top. I ordered a 3X, normally I am either a 2X or 3X and this fit well. The top is not too big and fits somewhat loose which is how I prefer my tops. There is a band at the bottom of the top but since there slits on the sides the band does not make the shirt snug at the bottom. I like how it has the buttons in the front so you can decided how you want the neckline. I machine washed this top and it washed very well. It is very comfortable to wear. I am very happy with the top and would order again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An overall nice shirt that can do double duty as casual and business casual
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice looking shirt to wear to the gym and it also looks great with a simple blue blazer and jeans for a night out. It is a nice length (short for a tunic for me at 5'7"), but still longer and the side slits and drop shoulders make it hang nicely. It isn't clingy at all. The sleeves are elbow length and the V-neck and waffle knit give it a slimming profile. It washed well and didn't stretch out; hanging to dry meant no ironing!The only minor issue was that it ran a little big, making it loose fitting but not boxy. Plan to get it in black!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The blouse is prettyRich colorDid Not fit true to Size - Too Large for size ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this top
reviews.reviewText: I love this top. It's a very comfortable fit - loose fitting - and perfect for casual situations. It looks good with shorts or jeans, again, for summer wear or casual lounging wear during the winter. It's a good fit as far as size and the material is nice and soft. The top is priced about where I'd expect it to be.
